speakers.name: JUSTICE ALITO
speakers.text: Well, this is -- well, why is this really a question of mens rea?  What was required by the statute is that some thing be transmitted in interstate commerce, and the thing is a threat.  So the question is what is this thing?  Is it a thing that is intended to cause fear, or is it a thing that just naturally causes fear?  Why is that -- I see your time is up, but I wish you had time to answer it. Why is that a question of mens rea?

speakers.name: CHIEF JUSTICE ROBERTS
speakers.text: You have time to answer.

speakers.name: CHIEF JUSTICE ROBERTS
speakers.text: Thank you, counsel.

speakers.name: CHIEF JUSTICE ROBERTS
speakers.text: 5 minutes, Alderson Reporting Company Mr. Elwood.

speakers.name: JUSTICE SCALIA
speakers.text: I thought you said it required intent the last time you -- you -- you referred to those two?

speakers.name: JUSTICE ALITO
speakers.text: Well, this sounds like a roadmap for threatening a spouse and getting away with it.  So you -- you put it in rhyme and you put some stuff about the Internet on it and you say, I'm an aspiring rap artist. And so then you are free from prosecution. Alderson Reporting Company

speakers.name: JUSTICE ALITO
speakers.text: Well, what do you say to the to the amici who say that if your position is adopted, this is going to have a very grave effect in cases of domestic violence? They're just wrong, they don't understand the situation?

speakers.name: CHIEF JUSTICE ROBERTS
speakers.text: Mm-hmm. Alderson Reporting Company

speakers.name: CHIEF JUSTICE ROBERTS
speakers.text: Thank you, counsel. The case is submitted.
